snippet.title: Imperiums: Greek wars - Join the Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Imperiums: Greek Wars is a unique combination of turn-based 4X and historical grand strategy with a mythological twist. Explore the ancient world and open it up to your people. Survive, expand, conquer... and win!
Sign-up for beta here https://imperiumsgame.com/apply-to-beta-test/ 
or wishlist on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1183470/Imperiums_Greek_Wars
Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1183470/discussions/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/hq9NC5Q
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kube_games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/imperiums_game/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Imperiums/
Website: http://imperiumsgame.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Imperiumsgame
